articles.author: ABP News Bureau
articles.title: Weekly Tech Wrap: iPhone 15 May Get Delayed, Netflix Gets Strict On Passwords, More Top Technology News - ABP Live
articles.description: Every week, we gather the top tech news headlines worth your time. From UN taking AI seriously to Twitter getting sued yet again, here are the top stories from the week that was.

articles.title: When Stars Fall Prey to Black Holes: Unraveling the Mystery of Tidal Disruption Events - SciTechDaily
articles.description: The Universe is a violent place where here even a star's life can be cut short. This happens when a star finds itself in a "bad" neighborhood, specifically in the proximity of a supermassive black hole. These black holes, boasting mass that is millions or eve…
articles.content:
ByUniversity of TurkuJuly 20, 2023
Supermassive black holes cause the disruption or destruction of nearby stars, resulting in Tidal Disruption Events (TDEs). Observations of polarized light from the… [+7042 chars]
